## WidgetDiv namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createDom()](./blockly.widgetdiv.createdom.md) | Create the widget div and inject it onto the page. |
|  [getDiv()](./blockly.widgetdiv.getdiv.md) | Returns the HTML container for editor widgets. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.widgetdiv.hide.md) | Destroy the widget and hide the div. |
|  [hideIfOwner(oldOwner)](./blockly.widgetdiv.hideifowner.md) | Destroy the widget and hide the div if it is being used by the specified object. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.widgetdiv.isvisible.md) | Is the container visible? |
|  [show(newOwner, rtl, newDispose)](./blockly.widgetdiv.show.md) | Initialize and display the widget div. Close the old one if needed. |
